h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Tiger’s Acolyte
content: While he has a varied assortment of combo attacks, some use only the sword and some only his claw. His most used claw attack will come when he holds it behind him and it begins to shine with a gold gleam. He’ll rush forward with a swipe, and then follow it shortly with a leg stomp, and then roll forward to end with a quick forward slash attack.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow_Sand_Formation_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow Sand Formation Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Windrest Hamlet' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Tiger’s Acolyte'.
The content is as follows:
While he has a varied assortment of combo attacks, some use only the sword and some only his claw. His most used claw attack will come when he holds it behind him and it begins to shine with a gold gleam. He’ll rush forward with a swipe, and then follow it shortly with a leg stomp, and then roll forward to end with a quick forward slash attack.
